column5: This home has two charming guest rooms available to rent, which comes with use of the living, dining, and kitchen areas. The first guest room has a comfortable queen size bed. The second room, best suited for children, has a set of fun bunk beds! Whether you're coming to Austin on business or for pleasure, this home will absolutely meet your needs! Access to the MetroRail system is only minutes away and riding the light rail train to downtown Austin is fun and easy!
column8: Guest Rooms in Comfortable Home Near Austin
